question: What is the efficiency of a machine that outputs 800 J of work when 1000 J of energy is input?

explanation.en: Efficiency = (Useful output / Total input) × 100% = (800 J / 1000 J) × 100% = 80%
explanation.bm: Kecekapan = (Keluaran berguna / Jumlah input) × 100% = (800 J / 1000 J) × 100% = 80%

subject: engineering
